pages.text: Taglock Kits are used to collect taglocks from other players or creatures. Taglocks, such as locks of hair, fingernail clippings or blood, are used in various practices to create a link between the creature and the magic.

pages.title: Collecting Taglocks
pages.text: Use a taglock kit on a creature, or the used bed of a player, to collect some taglocks from that being. Repeated use on the same bed will cycle taglocks for each player who has used that bed.$(p)The kit can also be used on a $(l:)Leech Chest$(/l) to collect taglocks from users who have opened the chest or on a $(l:)Blood Rose$(/l) to collect the taglock of the player that walked over it.

pages.title: Failures to collect
pages.text: Collecting taglocks by using the kit on a player has a chance of failing and informing the other player what you were trying to do. To increase the chance of collecting a taglock from a player sneak, and prefer approaching from behind.
